meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ghoulish.
meanings.sent1: Her ghoulishnesses were evident in her love for horror movies.
meanings.sent2: The ghoulishnesses of the haunted house scared the visitors.
meanings.sent3: Despite her ghoulishnesses, she had a kind heart.
meanings.sent4: The ghoulishnesses of the graveyard at night sent shivers down his spine.
meanings.sent5: The ghoulishnesses of the Halloween decorations made the house the spookiest on the block.

meanings.definition: The actions or behaviors characteristic of a ghoul.
meanings.sent1: The ghoulishnesses of the creature included feasting on human flesh.
meanings.sent2: His ghoulishnesses were revealed when he lurked in the shadows.
meanings.sent3: The ghoulishnesses of the ghoul were oddly fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: Her ghoulishnesses in the haunted maze made her the star of the Halloween party.
meanings.sent5: The ghoulishnesses of the ghoul's movements were both eerie and captivating.

meanings.definition: The eerie or macabre atmosphere associated with ghouls.
meanings.sent1: The ghoulishnesses of the foggy graveyard created a spooky scene.
meanings.sent2: As night fell, the ghoulishnesses of the forest became more pronounced.
meanings.sent3: The ghoulishnesses of the abandoned house made it a popular ghost tour destination.
meanings.sent4: The ghoulishnesses of the old cemetery seemed to whisper tales of the past.
meanings.sent5: In the dim candlelight, the ghoulishnesses of the room took on a haunting beauty.
